item.description:
In light of recent events in Boston, we thought this would be a timely and useful topic to discuss together.

How do you manage your emotions when "bad" things happen that seem out of your control?

Additionally, the law of attraction states that to allow what you want to manifest, you must be a vibrational match; which, in large part, means to be in a positive frame of mind and vibration.

How do you manage this when circumstances seem so undesirable? (like being unemployed, relationship breakups, money problems, and unexpected bombs going off!)  How do you deal with the "reality"?

Mark and I have some ideas to share that we find really useful; and we want to hear your ideas, too.  Let's mastermind together and end the evening feeling strong and resourceful with new strategies ready to use. Our meetup is all about feeling good, after all.

We look forward to this powerful evening with you!

If you RSVP "yes", please be considerate of us as your hosts, and either show up, or let us know of your change in plans so we won't be preparing for you, waiting for you or leaving someone on a waiting list unnecessarily. Thank you!

Important Note: Easy parking is also available just down the street on Garvey Road. Be sure to park on the ODD numbered side of the street (the right side if you're turning left onto the street from Edmands Rd). If you park in our driveway, please park as efficiently as possible to allow the maximum number of spaces for people (i.e. 3 cars in front of garage). Backing into your spot will make it easier to maneuver out once other cars are parked.

Also, our driveway was badly damaged over this winter, so it's a bit "messy" and has some potholes. Please be aware of this and be careful when you walk.
item.how_to_find_us: We're down a long driveway. Look for white mailbox with our name and #276, across from large, old, white house

group.name: "Good Vibrations" Metro West Law of Attraction Community

item.name: How to manage your emotions & tell a better feeling story when bad things happen
